titles.title: FISA Reform and Reauthorization Act of 2023
FISA Reform and Reauthorization Act of 2023
To amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to make certain reforms to the authorities under such Act, to reauthorize title VII of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Intelligence. H. Rept. 118-302, Part I.

committee.name: House Intelligence (Permanent Select)
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
